transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji?

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: India Mart se bol rahe hain?

Customer: Hanji.

Executive: Ye asal mein mam ye I wood handicraft ka wo bhi diya tha na ji.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Uske liye aap baat karni thi. Account manager diya hua tha.

Customer: Haan, bataiye.

Executive: Sir mam isme thodi problem chal rahi hai ki baat client se baat kar rahe hain lekin koi response nahi de raha hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Client se baat kar rahe hain lead vagaira aa rahi hai.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Lead pe baat kar rahe hain lekin koi reply vagaira kuch aisa response nahi kar raha hai koi.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Ji.

Executive: Main confirm karke aapko na fir aap account manager jo hai ye aapke handle karte hain to unhi se call karvati hu.

Customer: Thik hai mam. Mam wo jo mera account manager hai wo hai mam sun bhi hai mam.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Ji.

Executive: Thik hai mam karvaiye call aap.

Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: Thik hai thik hai.

Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper response from leads.

- Wants account manager to call regarding the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to connect with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, response
